name: Hello Hats
description:
A year after escaping the clutches of the abandoned Hello Hats theater, Beta and her friend Moon decide to go back too collect evidence of the puppets existence and finally expose their evil plan.

This is a very short experience, I just turned some of Levs concept art from a bit over a year ago into a playable game! Just a little passion project I made out of love for the AU.

ALSO a VERY SPECIAL THANKS to Notafamousblog/CreatorofYes for composing the title theme!! He did a phenomenal job and you guys should totally throw him some support!

With that being said, I hope you enjoy this silly little project!
